trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes what the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer.GetPattern%2A> method returns when depending on the value of `patternInterface`: |The value of `patternInterface`|The return value| |-------------------------------------|----------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|A reference to the current instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer> for this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider> interface.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.|
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente descrive ciò che restituisce il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer.GetPattern%2A>in base al valore `patternInterface`: | Il valore di `patternInterface`| Il valore restituito | |-------------------------------------|----------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>| Un riferimento all'istanza corrente del <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>| Il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer>per questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>| Oggetto che implementa l'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>| Oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider>interfaccia. |</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer.GetPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo se patternInterface è un valore supportato; in caso contrario, .
